CIRCULAR NO. 8 / 2003 
 
 
 
Subject: 
CATEGORIZATION OF AIRPORTS 
 
 
In super session of this office Circular No. 18/98 dated 7.8.1998 on the 
above subject, threat perception has been reviewed  on the categorization of 
airports.  A revised consolidated list of Normal, Sensitive and Hypersensitive 
airports is given below for information and necessary action:

NORMAL AIRPORTS
